title: I have this weird problem and I think its pocket loss?
body: My problem started a month ago, while playing my character would stop moving and no spells can be used. Everything around me is perfectly fine like I can see my allies move, the enemy move and see them attacking me but cant do anything about it. The stoping duration will be like 7 seconds and then after it my character would start doing all the moves and spells I press within the 7 seconds. I move to different computers in my house and I am still experiencing that problem. I try using WTFast and that didnt do anything. I follow the link from league website but I cant use it because you need Java and google chrome stop using Java. Plz someone help me fix this problem.

replies.body: Sounds like packet loss.  Have you tried uploading your logs via our [Log Reader?](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) This should help you to find out whether or not it's packet loss (and some potential fixes if it is!). Shouldn't require any Java on your end :D  Let me know if this helps!
Packet loss is heavily due to one's own internet rather than anything that Riot can avoid. Of course, sometimes it is server based (But everybody feels those ones)
